metadata.dc:author: Sandoval, C A
Subira, M L
Temiño, M A
Valdivia, L
Garbayo, J M
Quintanilla, E
metadata.dc:description: We have presented a study of two cases of Mycosis Fungoides with special emphasis on the staging of the disease as well as on the immunological findings and their modification with chemotherapy. Our objective, to relate the immunological response to clinical evolution, proposes a way of determining prognosis in the evolution of this poorly understood disease.
metadata.dc:title: Micosis fungoide. Estudio clínico y respuesta inmunológica a la quimioterapia en dos casos.
[Mycosis fungoides. Clinical study and immunologic response to chemotherapy in 2 cases].
